data.name: Ghouls Underground
data.detailed_description:
IF you want my last game CURSE OF RASUMAN to appear on Steam too, please support on Kickstarter:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/957008919/curse-of-rasuman-the-story-of-archibaldoega-limited-colour

I created the adaptation of an imaginary arcade cabinet video game.
Only one level but this one is really gigantic to explore!
I can not say that this is an endless game, because there is an end, but it will take you so many hours to overcome it.
Lead a team of heroes to destroy evil in a dangerous labyrinth full of various enemies and traps. A lot of treasures and weapons to find!
keyboard or usb xbox controller available (I don't try other joypads)
Warning this is not a simply shoot em up but a metroidvania too, so you need to find specific items to open specific ways.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: all
  • Additional Notes: it's run perfectly on low PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: all
  • Additional Notes: it's run perfectly on low PC
